select pm.id, pm.pdt_name, pm.pdt_price, pim.save_name, pm_cnt.product_total_count from pdt_mst pm left outer join pdt_image_mst pim on(pim.pdt_id = pm.id) left outer join ( select count(*) product_total_count from pdt_mst where 1 = 1
and category_id = (select id from pdt_category_mst where category_name = #{category}) ) pm_cnt on(1 = 1) where 1 = 1
and pm.category_id = (select id from pdt_category_mst where category_name = #{category})
group by pm.id limit #{index}, #{limitCount};

SELECT pm.id, pc.category_name, pm.pdt_name, pm.pdt_price, pd.pdt_design FROM pdt_mst pm LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_dtl pd ON(pd.id = pm.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_category_mst pc ON(pc.id = pm.category_id) WHERE pd.id = pm.id

SELECT pm.id AS pdt_id, pm.pdt_name, pm.pdt_price, pd.id AS pdt_dtl_id, pd.pdt_design, pd.pdt_stock, pim.save_name FROM pdt_mst pm LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_dtl pd ON(pd.pdt_id = pm.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN pdt_image_mst pim ON(pim.pdt_id = pm.id) WHERE pm.id = #{pdtID}
